data.text: @tickytacky23 @ONThealth @ONgov 90% of the population is vaccinated. Take responsibility for your own health. Talk to your dr about your actual risk but the rest of us can’t continue to be restricted because of your health.

@MarkParalovos @Cricrifi @ONThealth It proves that all the approvals were dripping with politics. 
Get the great psychological virus stopper to an adoring public as soon as possible. 
Then increase the jab volumes at will…now at 3 and leaning into 4. 
These side effects are statistically notable…but pushed in.

@tickytacky23 @ONThealth @ONgov After the release of the Pfizer documents listing over 1200 deaths in the first three months of injections and over 9 pages of adverse reactions, how can you possibly continue to promote these shots? What is wrong with you?
@tickytacky23 @ONThealth @ONgov Your choice to ware a mask if it makes you feel better, my choice not to wear one because I know they do more harm than good!
